snoopy.blindnote: This snoRNA is a close copy of the snoRNA U58A cloned by Kiss-Laszlo et al. (1996), and is predicted to guide the 2'O-ribose methylation of 28S rRNA G4340.(comment in snoRNABase) (20100707末安)UCSCを参考にgenomic positionを変更した,NCBIを参考にaccession Noを加えた,evidenceはsnoRNAbaseのレファレンスから抜粋。
snoopy.evidence: Kiss-Laszlo, Z., Henry, Y., Bachellerie, J. P., Caizergues-Ferrer, M., and Kiss, T. (1996). Site-specific ribose methylation of preribosomal RNA: a novel function for small nucleolar RNAs. Cell, 85, 1077-1088.
